steps.thought:
The cheapest way to travel from London to Paris is typically by budget flights. Ryanair and EasyJet usually offer flights starting around £50-£100 depending on the time of booking and season.

Action: Search: {"query": "average flight cost from London to Paris"}

action.params: average flight cost from London to Paris

steps.observation:
- [Verified Local Guide]:
--- (Source: london.txt) ---
5 London City Airport (LCY IATA). Just 3.5 mi (5.6 km) from Canary Wharf, this "commuter" airport has short-haul flights from other major European cities. Also some holiday routes. British Airways and Lufthansa are among the airlines which fly into London City Airport.   (updated Jan 2024).
Plane tickets at London City tend to be more expensive than at other airports. London City Airport lies in east London. Onward travel is viaː

steps.thought: Action: Search: {"query": "transportation cost from Paris to London"}

action.params: transportation cost from Paris to London

steps.observation:
- Travel by train from Paris to London with Eurostar. Book cheap train tickets from €44 and travel in just 2 hrs 17 mins.
- Travel Information from Paris to London ; Train, bus or flight · $24 - $108 · Bus • $24 (€21) • 8 h 25 min · Flight • $42 (€38) • 1 h 5 min · BlaBlaCar Bus, Vueling ...
- The price of train tickets from Paris to London starts at $19.52§ one-way for a Standard Class ticket if you book in advance. Most train companies across Europe ...
- The average ticket price for trains between Paris and London run US$189 when booked 30 days before travel and US$146 when booked 7 days in advance. The best way ...
- Alternatively, you can bus via Calais, which costs £30 - £50 and takes 7h 39m, you could also fly, which costs £90 - £260 and takes 4h 10m.

evidence.content: Travel by train from Paris to London with Eurostar. Book cheap train tickets from €44 and travel in just 2 hrs 17 mins.
Travel Information from Paris to London ; Train, bus or flight · $24 - $108 · Bus • $24 (€21) • 8 h 25 min · Flight • $42 (€38) • 1 h 5 min · BlaBlaCar Bus, Vueling ...
The price of train tickets from Paris to London starts at $19.52§ one-way for a Standard Class ticket if you book in advance. Most train companies across Europe ...
The average ticket price for trains between Paris and London run US$189 when booked 30 days before travel and US$146 when booked 7 days in advance. The best way ...
Alternatively, you can bus via Calais, which costs £30 - £50 and takes 7h 39m, you could also fly, which costs £90 - £260 and takes 4h 10m.

final:
To travel from Paris to London, consider the following options and their approximate costs:
Train (Eurostar):
• Cost: €44 one-way (source: Eurostar).
• Duration: 2 hours and 17 minutes.
Bus:
• Cost: €21-€35 one-way (source: Omio and Rome2rio).
• Duration: 7 hours and 25 minutes to 7 hours and 39 minutes.
Flight:
• Cost: €38-€210 one-way (source: Omio and Rome2rio).
• Duration: 1 hour and 5 minutes to 4 hours and 10 minutes.
Note: Prices are approximate and may vary depending on booking time, class, and availability.
